msbt.message: So I thought that pointy part on the horseshoe crab was totally, like, a horn at first, . Which would have been tr√®s cool, because that would mean this crab was basically a unicorn! But the pointy thing is just its tail. Which is still pretty cool, but you know.not UNICORN cool.
Sea pineapples are kinda strange, don't you think, ?Like, I can't decide if they're edgy and coolor kinda weird and gross. Not that it's their fault or anything.
I'll be honest, that lobster's giant claws look totes scary to me!Like, I'm sure it's friendly and everything, but I would NOT want to shake its hand, !
The gigas giant clam is waaay huge!If I was a mermaid, I would totes sleep inside one of these, !
The umbrella octopus is so, so, SO adorbs! Just look at those big ears!What? Those earsare fins? Well, whatevs. It's super cute either way, .
Have you seen how mega huge the red king crab is? No wonder it's the ruler of the crabs.I mean, who'd want to fight it for the title? Not me, !
The moon jellyfish is, like, soooo chill. It doesn't look like it worries about anything, . I guess I'd be super chill too if I could sting anyone who messed with me!
Isn't it totes cute how the chambered nautilus acts all shy, ? Sure, it hides in its shell, but I bet what it really wants to dois come out and hang with moi!
Do you think the spider crab ever, like, trips over its own legs, ? I mean, look how many legs it has! And they're SO long too. Walking has got to be totes awkward.

Did you know that pill bugs and giant isopods are related?I mean, I'm not sure if they're, like, second cousins or, you know, share a great-aunt on their mother's side But if you look closely, you can definitely see the family resemblance, .

Wait, what?! You're the one that donated it? That's beyond cool!Your diving skills must be sooo next level. I mean, for real.Anyway, thanks for making it so I can see it up close and personal. You're the best, .
